entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
